00089         // AUTHENTICATION
00090 
00104         public function authenticate($bucket, $opt = null, $location = null, $redirects = 0)
00105         {
00106                 // If nothing was passed in, don't do anything.
00107                 if (!$opt)
00108                 {
00109                         return false;
00110                 }
00111                 else
00112                 {
00113                         // Set default values
00114                         $bucket = strtolower($bucket);
00115                         $acl = null;
00116                         $body = null;
00117                         $contentType = null;
00118                         $delimiter = null;
00119                         $filename = null;
00120                         $marker = null;
00121                         $maxKeys = null;
00122                         $method = null;
00123                         $prefix = null;
00124                         $verb = null;
00125                         $returnCurlHandle = null;
00126 
00127                         // Break the array into individual variables, while storing the original.
00128                         $_opt = $opt;
00129                         extract($opt);
00130 
00131                         // Set hostname
00132                         if ($method == 'list_buckets')
00133                         {
00134                                 $hostname = 's3.amazonaws.com';
00135                         }
00136                         else
00137                         {
00138                                 $hostname = $bucket . '.s3.amazonaws.com';
00139                         }
00140 
00141                         // Get the UTC timestamp in RFC 2616 format
00142                         $httpDate = gmdate(DATE_AWS_RFC2616, time());
00143 
00144                         // Generate the request string
00145                         $request = '';
00146 
00147                         // Append additional parameters
00148                         $request .= '/' . $filename;
00149 
00150                         // List Object settings
00151                         if ($method == 'list_objects')
00152                         {
00153                                 if (isset($prefix) && !empty($prefix))
00154                                 {
00155                                         $request = '/?prefix=' . $prefix;
00156                                 }
00157                                 else if (isset($marker) && !empty($marker))
00158                                 {
00159                                         $request = '/?marker=' . $marker;
00160                                 }
00161                                 else if (isset($maxKeys) && !empty($maxKeys))
00162                                 {
00163                                         $request = '/?max-keys=' . $maxKeys;
00164                                 }
00165                                 else if (isset($delimiter) && !empty($delimiter))
00166                                 {
00167                                         $request = '/?delimiter=' . $delimiter;
00168                                 }
00169                         }
00170 
00171                         // Get Bucket Locale settings
00172                         if ($method == 'get_bucket_locale')
00173                         {
00174                                 $request = '/?location';
00175                                 $filename = '?location';
00176                         }
00177 
00178                         if (!$request == '/')
00179                         {
00180                                 $request = '/' . $request;
00181                         }
00182 
00183                         // Prepare the request.
00184                         if ($location)
00185                         {
00186                                 $this->request_url = $location;
00187                         }
00188                         else
00189                         {
00190                                 $this->request_url = 'http://' . $hostname . $request;
00191                         }
00192 
00193                         $req = new $this->request_class($this->request_url);
00194 
00195                         // Do we have a verb?
00196                         if (isset($verb) && !empty($verb))
00197                         {
00198                                 $req->setMethod($verb);
00199                         }
00200 
00201                         // Do we have a contentType?
00202                         if (isset($contentType) && !empty($contentType))
00203                         {
00204                                 $req->addHeader("Content-Type", $contentType);
00205                         }
00206                         else if ($verb == HTTP_PUT) // Set a default value for HTTP_PUT
00207                         {
00208                                 $contentType = 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded';
00209                         }
00210 
00211                         // Do we have a date?
00212                         if (isset($httpDate) && !empty($httpDate))
00213                         {
00214                                 $req->addHeader("Date", $httpDate);
00215                         }
00216 
00217                         // Do we have ACL settings? (Optional in signed string)
00218                         if (isset($acl) && !empty($acl))
00219                         {
00220                                 $req->addHeader("x-amz-acl", $acl);
00221                                 $acl = 'x-amz-acl:' . $acl . "\n";
00222                         }
00223 
00224                         // Do we have COPY settings?
00225                         if ($method == 'copy_object')
00226                         {
00227                                 $acl .= 'x-amz-copy-source:/' . $sourceBucket . '/' . $sourceObject . "\n";
00228                                 $req->addHeader('x-amz-copy-source', '/' . $sourceBucket . '/' . $sourceObject);
00229                         }
00230 
00231                         // Add a body if we're creating
00232                         if ($method == 'create_object' || $method == 'create_bucket')
00233                         {
00234                                 if (isset($body) && !empty($body))
00235                                 {
00236                                         $req->setBody($body);
00237                                 }
00238                         }
00239 
00240                         // Data that will be "signed".
00241                         $filename = '/' . $filename;
00242 
00243                         // If we're listing buckets, there is no filename value.
00244                         if ($method == 'list_buckets')
00245                         {
00246                                 $filename = '';
00247                         }
00248 
00249                         // Prepare the string to sign
00250                         $stringToSign = "$verb\n\n$contentType\n$httpDate\n$acl/$bucket$filename";
00251 
00252                         // Hash the AWS secret key and generate a signature for the request.
00253                         $signature = $this->util->hex_to_base64(hash_hmac('sha1', $stringToSign, $this->secret_key));
00254 
00255                         // Pass the developer key and signature
00256                         $req->addHeader("Authorization", "AWS " . $this->key . ":" . $signature);
00257 
00258                         // If we have a "true" value for returnCurlHandle, do that instead of completing the request.
00259                         if ($returnCurlHandle)
00260                         {
00261                                 return $req->prepRequest();
00262                         }
00263 
00264                         // Send!
00265                         $req->sendRequest();
00266 
00267                         // Prepare the response.
00268                         $headers = $req->getResponseHeader();
00269                         $headers['x-tarzan-redirects'] = $redirects;
00270                         $headers['x-tarzan-requesturl'] = $this->request_url;
00271                         $headers['x-tarzan-stringtosign'] = $stringToSign;
00272                         $data = new $this->response_class($headers, $req->getResponseBody(), $req->getResponseCode());
00273 
00274                         // Did Amazon tell us to redirect? Typically happens for multiple rapid requests EU datacenters.
00275                         // @see http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AmazonS3/2006-03-01/Redirects.html
00276                         if ((int) $req->getResponseCode() == 307) // Temporary redirect to new endpoint.
00277                         {
00278                                 $redirects++;
00279                                 $data = $this->authenticate($bucket, 
00280                                         $_opt, 
00281                                         $headers['location'], 
00282                                         $redirects);
00283                         }
00284 
00285                         // Return!
00286                         return $data;
00287                 }
00288         }

00308         public function create_bucket($bucket, $locale = null, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00309         {
00310                 // Defaults
00311                 $body = null;
00312                 $contentType = null;
00313 
00314                 if ($locale)
00315                 {
00316                         switch(strtolower($locale))
00317                         {
00318                                 case 'eu':
00319                                         $body = '<CreateBucketConfiguration><LocationConstraint>' . strtoupper($locale) . '</LocationConstraint></CreateBucketConfiguration>';
00320                                         $contentType = 'application/xml';
00321                                         break;
00322                         }
00323                 }
00324 
00325                 // Authenticate to S3
00326                 return $this->authenticate($bucket, array(
00327                         'verb' => HTTP_PUT,
00328                         'method' => 'create_bucket',
00329                         'body' => $body,
00330                         'contentType' => $contentType,
00331                         'returnCurlHandle' => $returnCurlHandle
00332                 ));
00333         }

00347         }

00365                 $opt['method'] = 'get_bucket_locale';
00366                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;

00422         public function delete_bucket($bucket, $force = false, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00423         {
00424                 // Set default value
00425                 $success = true;
00426 
00427                 if ($force)
00428                 {
00429                         // Delete all of the items from the bucket.
00430                         $success = $this->delete_all_objects($bucket);
00431                 }
00432 
00433                 // As long as we were successful...
00434                 if ($success)
00435                 {
00436                         // Add this to our request
00437                         $opt = array();
00438                         $opt['verb'] = HTTP_DELETE;
00439                         $opt['method'] = 'delete_bucket';
00440                         $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00441 
00442                         // Authenticate to S3
00443                         return $this->authenticate($bucket, $opt);
00444                 }
00445 
00446                 return false;
00447         }
00448 
00461         public function copy_bucket($source_bucket, $dest_bucket)
00462         {
00463                 $dest = $this->create_bucket($dest_bucket);
00464 
00465                 if ($dest->isOK())
00466                 {
00467                         $list = $this->get_object_list($source_bucket);
00468                         $handles = array();
00469         
00470                         foreach ($list as $item)
00471                         {
00472                                 $handles[] = $this->copy_object($source_bucket, $item, $dest_bucket, $item, S3_ACL_PRIVATE, true);
00473                         }
00474 
00475                         $request = new $this->request_class(null);
00476                         return $request->sendMultiRequest($handles);
00477                 }
00478         }
00479 
00490         public function rename_bucket($source_bucket, $dest_bucket)
00491         {
00492                 $responses = array();
00493                 $responses['copy'] = $this->copy_bucket($source_bucket, $dest_bucket);
00494                 $responses['delete'] = $this->delete_bucket($source_bucket, true);
00495 
00496                 return $responses;
00497         }

00523         public function get_bucket_filesize($bucket, $friendly_format = false)
00524         {
00525                 $filesize = 0;
00526                 $list = $this->list_objects($bucket);
00527 
00528                 foreach ($list->body->Contents as $filename)
00529                 {
00530                         $filesize += (int) $filename->Size;
00531                 }
00532 
00533                 if ($friendly_format)
00534                 {
00535                         $filesize = $this->util->size_readable($filesize);
00536                 }
00537 
00538                 return $filesize;
00539         }

00560 
00570         public function get_bucket_list($pcre = null)
00571         {
00572                 // Set some default values
00573                 $bucketnames = array();
00574 
00575                 // Get a list of buckets.
00576                 $list = $this->list_buckets();
00577 
00578                 // If we have a PCRE regex, store it.
00579                 if ($pcre)
00580                 {
00581                         // Loop through and find the bucket names.
00582                         foreach ($list->body->Buckets->Bucket as $bucket)
00583                         {
00584                                 $bucket = (string) $bucket->Name;
00585 
00586                                 if (preg_match($pcre, $bucket))
00587                                 {
00588                                         $bucketnames[] = $bucket;
00589                                 }
00590                         }
00591                 }
00592                 else
00593                 {
00594                         // Loop through and find the bucket names.
00595                         foreach ($list->body->Buckets->Bucket as $bucket)
00596                         {
00597                                 $bucketnames[] = (string) $bucket->Name;
00598                         }
00599                 }
00600 
00601                 return (count($bucketnames) > 0) ? $bucketnames : null;
00602         }

00636                 $opt['filename'] = rawurlencode($opt['filename']);
00637 
00638                 // Authenticate to S3
00639                 return $this->authenticate($bucket, $opt);
00640         }

00744         public function delete_all_objects($bucket, $pcre = S3_PCRE_ALL)
00745         {
00746                 // Collect all matches
00747                 $list = $this->get_object_list($bucket, array('pcre', $pcre));
00748 
00749                 // As long as we have at least one match...
00750                 if (count($list) > 0)
00751                 {
00752                         // Hold CURL handles
00753                         $handles = array();
00754 
00755                         // Go through all of the items and delete them.
00756                         foreach ($list as $item)
00757                         {
00758                                 $handles[] = $this->delete_object($bucket, $item, true);
00759                         }
00760 
00761                         $request = new $this->request_class(null);
00762                         return $request->sendMultiRequest($handles);
00763                 }
00764 
00765                 return false;
00766         }

00808         public function get_object_filesize($bucket, $filename, $friendly_format = false)
00809         {
00810                 $object = $this->head_object($bucket, $filename);
00811                 $filesize = (integer) $object->header['content-length'];
00812 
00813                 if ($friendly_format)
00814                 {
00815                         $filesize = $this->util->size_readable($filesize);
00816                 }
00817 
00818                 return $filesize;
00819         }

00839         public function get_object_list($bucket, $opt = null)
00840         {
00841                 // Set some default values
00842                 $filenames = array();
00843                 $pcre = null;
00844 
00845                 // Get a list of files.
00846                 $list = $this->list_objects($bucket, $opt);
00847 
00848                 // Extract the options
00849                 if ($opt)
00850                 {
00851                         extract($opt);
00852                 }
00853 
00854                 // If we have a PCRE regex, store it.
00855                 if ($pcre)
00856                 {
00857                         // Loop through and find the filenames.
00858                         foreach ($list->body->Contents as $file)
00859                         {
00860                                 $file = (string) $file->Key;
00861 
00862                                 if (preg_match($pcre, $file))
00863                                 {
00864                                         $filenames[] = $file;
00865                                 }
00866                         }
00867                 }
00868                 else
00869                 {
00870                         // Loop through and find the filenames.
00871                         foreach ($list->body->Contents as $file)
00872                         {
00873                                 $filenames[] = (string) $file->Key;
00874                         }
00875                 }
00876 
00877                 return (count($filenames) > 0) ? $filenames : null;
00878         }

00897         public function copy_object($source_bucket, $source_filename, $dest_bucket, $dest_filename, $acl = S3_ACL_PRIVATE, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00898         {
00899                 // Add this to our request
00900                 $opt['verb'] = HTTP_PUT;
00901                 $opt['method'] = 'copy_object';
00902                 $opt['sourceBucket'] = $source_bucket;
00903                 $opt['sourceObject'] = $source_filename;
00904                 $opt['destinationBucket'] = $dest_bucket;
00905                 $opt['destinationObject'] = $dest_filename;
00906                 $opt['metadataDirective'] = 'COPY';
00907                 $opt['acl'] = $acl;
00908                 $opt['filename'] = rawurlencode($dest_filename);
00909                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00910 
00911                 // Authenticate to S3
00912                 return $this->authenticate($dest_bucket, $opt);
00913         }
00914 
00927         public function duplicate_object($bucket, $source_filename, $dest_filename, $acl = S3_ACL_PRIVATE)
00928         {
00929                 return $this->copy_object($bucket, $source_filename, $bucket, $dest_filename, $acl);
00930         }

00945         public function move_object($source_bucket, $source_filename, $dest_bucket, $dest_filename, $acl = S3_ACL_PRIVATE)
00946         {
00947                 $copy = $this->copy_object($source_bucket, $source_filename, $dest_bucket, $dest_filename, $acl);
00948                 $del = $this->delete_object($source_bucket, $source_filename);
00949                 return $copy;
00950         }
00951 
00964         public function rename_object($bucket, $source_filename, $dest_filename, $acl = S3_ACL_PRIVATE)
00965         {
00966                 return $this->move_object($bucket, $source_filename, $bucket, $dest_filename, $acl);
00967         }

00970         /*%******************************************************************************************%*/
00971         // MISCELLANEOUS METHODS
00972 
00990         public function store_remote_file($remote_file, $bucket, $filename, $opt = null)
00991         {
00992                 // Set default values.
00993                 $acl = S3_ACL_PUBLIC;
00994                 $overwrite = false;
00995                 $cname = null;
00996 
00997                 if ($opt)
00998                 {
00999                         // Break the options out.
01000                         extract($opt);
01001                 }
01002 
01003                 // Does the file already exist?
01004                 $object = $this->head_object($bucket, $filename);
01005 
01006                 // As long as it doesn't already exist, fetch and store it.
01007                 if (!$object->isOK() || $overwrite)
01008                 {
01009                         // Fetch the file
01010                         $file = new $this->request_class($remote_file);
01011                         $file->sendRequest();
01012 
01013                         // Store it in S3
01014                         unset($object);
01015                         $object = $this->create_object($bucket, array(
01016                                 'filename' => $filename,
01017                                 'body' => $file->getResponseBody(),
01018                                 'contentType' => $file->getResponseHeader('content-type'),
01019                                 'acl' => $acl
01020                         ));
01021                 }
01022 
01023                 // Was the request successful?
01024                 if ($object->isOK())
01025                 {
01026                         $url = $object->header['x-tarzan-requesturl'];
01027 
01028                         // If we have a CNAME value, use that instead of Amazon's hostname. There are better ways of doing this, but it works for now.
01029                         if ($cname)
01030                         {
01031                                 $url = str_ireplace('http://', '', $url);
01032                                 $url = explode('/', $url);
01033                                 $url[0] = $cname;
01034                                 $url = 'http://' . implode('/', $url);
01035                         }
01036 
01037                         return $url;
01038                 }
01039                 else
01040                 {
01041                         return null;
01042                 }
01043         }
01044 }
